title: Magnetic flux - emf and current in changing field

content.question:
A square loop of side length <math alttext="s" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>s</mi></math> is placed in a region where there is a variable magnetic field given by <math alttext="B of t equals, B sub 0, end sub, times the sine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>B</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>B</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>, where positive values of <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>B</mi></math> represent a magnetic field directed out of the page. Which of the following options correctly indicates the absolute value of the <math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math> <math alttext="the absolute value of open E of t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>|</mo><mpadded><mi>Ɛ</mi><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mi>t</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></mpadded><mo>|</mo></mpadded></math> induced in the loop as a function of time and the direction of current in the loop at time <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> ?
<math alttext="e m f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>emf</mi></math>Current Direction at <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>A<math alttext="the absolute value of open E of t, end absolute value, equals s squared, times B sub 0, end sub, times omega, times the cosine of open parenthesis, omega t, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>|</mo><mi>Ɛ</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>B</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><mi>ω</mi><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>ω</mi><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>clockwiseB<math alttext="the absolute value of open E of t, end absolute value, equals s skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
